title: Anyone using Logitech G900 in this game?  Advice needed.
body:
I have disabled mouse acceleration and set my dpi appropiately yet I still experience some form of acceleration where my mouse will slow down more the slower I move it and speed up the faster I move it towards the edge of the screen.

 Any advice would be appreciated thank you.

replies.body: Disabled it where, and what OS?
I disabled enhanced pointer precision in windows 10 and there is no option for mouse acceleration in the logitech app.
Where can I adjust that setting?
i would figure that would be in your logitech app. but if you dont even know it existed then never mind, as i doubt it would be the problem in that case.

You may actually just want to play with the pointer speed options in your normal mouse settings first.  I'm pretty sure these work 'with' all the logitech settings, they aren't disabled by logitech.  Sounds like you want to fiddle with pointer speed and Enhance Pointer Precision in the (probably) third tab for mouse in control panel.

Possibly disable smooth camera in Options -> Game if you don't have it disabled already.

I see you already disabled enhanced pointer precision. So if neither is the solution it's probably a G900 thing.
